name: Smoked Lobster
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, lobster, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the lobsters for 10 minutes. When cool enough to handle, remove the tail and claw meat. Place the wood chips in the bottom of a stove-top smoker and place the lobster meat on the rack over the chips. Place over medium heat until the wood begins to smolder. Cover and smoke for 10 minutes.
